meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Paul Manuel Andrew Fuller Sara Heard Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6131.

td.p: John Paul Manuel, an operations specialist from San Francisco, California
Andrew Fuller, a special education teacher from Elburn, Illinois
Sara Heard, a housewife from Brooklyn, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $70,400)

tr.td: REAL HISTORICAL HOUSEWIVES OF D.C.
FOOD WORDS & PHRASES
FORBES' MOST-EDUCATED SMALL TOWNS
"A" IS FOR AUTHOR
HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
(Sarah: The world behind-the-scenes that creates the amazing worlds onstage.)

John Paul
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
